snippet: If you’re going to watch the United States Grand Prix on Speed this Sunday, look closely when a car comes in for a tire change. But look quickly. Pit stops are usually over within three seconds.
abstract: Most exciting part of Formula One Grand Prix races may be pit stops, mandatory for competitors; they take less than three seconds, including tire changes, with faster pit crews.
lead_paragraph: If you’re going to watch the United States Grand Prix on Speed this Sunday, look closely when a car comes in for a tire change. But look quickly. Pit stops are usually over within three seconds.

headline.seo: Smart Spectating: It’s the Pit Stops
headline.main: Smart Spectating: It’s the Pit Stops
headline.print_headline: Smart Spectating: It’s the Pit Stops
